publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1247 Cathy Peattie: World Asthma Day - Living on a Knife Edge-That the Parliament notes with great concern the shocking statistics in the report Living on a Knife Edge, published by Asthma UK Scotland; notes that, in particular, there are 400,000 people in Scotland who have asthma, of whom 200,000 have serious asthma, including 40,000 people who live in fear that their next asthma attack will be fatal, and welcomes the new Asthma Attack Card produced by Asthma UK Scotland that gives clear advice to help reduce the number of unnecessary deaths.
S2M-1247 World Asthma Day - Living on a Knife Edge (lodged on 30 April 2004) Colin Fox*, Mike Pringle*, Murray Tosh*, Margaret Smith*
S2M-1247 World Asthma Day - Living on a Knife Edge (lodged on 30 April 2004) Sarah Boyack*, David Mundell*, Maureen Macmillan*
